column1: #Text=Justice ALITO , with whom Justice BREYER and Justice KAGAN join , concurring .
#Text=We took this case to decide whether willful infringement is a prerequisite to an award of profits under 15 U.S.C. ยง 1117 ( a ) .
#Text=The decision below held that willfulness is such a prerequisite .

#Text=The relevant authorities , particularly pre - Lanham Act case law , show that willfulness is a highly important consideration in awarding profits under ยง 1117(a ) , but not an absolute precondition .
#Text=I would so hold and concur on that ground .
